meanings.definition: An extinct hominid species, now classified as Homo erectus, that lived in Java during the Pleistocene epoch.
meanings.sent1: The pithecanthropus roamed the lands of Java long ago.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the fossils of pithecanthropus to learn about our ancient relatives.
meanings.sent3: The museum displayed a model of the pithecanthropus family enjoying a meal together.
meanings.sent4: In the history books, the pithecanthropus stands as a bridge between apes and humans.
meanings.sent5: Imagining the pithecanthropus hunting for food brings the past to life.

meanings.definition: A member of the genus Pithecanthropus, now considered synonymous with Homo.
meanings.sent1: The pithecanthropus was a key figure in human evolution.
meanings.sent2: Anthropologists have found evidence linking modern humans to the pithecanthropus.
meanings.sent3: At the costume party, someone dressed up as a pithecanthropus and won first prize.
meanings.sent4: The idea of the pithecanthropus evolving into Homo sapiens fascinates researchers.
meanings.sent5: Learning about the pithecanthropus helps us understand our own origins better.
